job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Application Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using and improving existing AI systems for customer support rather than developing new AI models or applications from scratch. While it involves AI, the core tasks are about application support, ticket analysis, and providing feedback for AI improvement, which aligns more with using AI tools to enhance productivity rather than core AI engineering roles like ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer. The emphasis is on 'application support' and 'customer resolutions' using AI, not on building the AI itself.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding customer issues and how AI can be used to resolve them, implying a need to grasp the business context of customer support.
The phrase 'participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions' directly relates to adapting or improving existing AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'prototyping and testing new AI tools and methodologies', which suggests some level of software development or integration work.
job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities' implies developing or working with systems that combine human input with AI.
job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities

soft_skills.phrase: ramp up one several products within the first month
